Keywords: Excalibur , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist , Warrior
Real Name: Brian Braddock
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
I NO LONGER HAVE THE TEMPERAMENT TO BE CAPTAIN BRITAIN: Leadership. // When Captain Avalon takes damage from an attack, roll a d6 and Captain Avalon can use the listed power until the end of your next turn.
*1-3: Battle Fury.
*4-6: Willpower.
I DRAW THE SWORD OF MIGHT IN DEFENSE OF AVALON: Steal Energy. When Captain Avalon uses it, if he occupies a square closer to his starting area than your opponent's, heal 2 clicks instead.
Figure Errata
Changed: I No Longer Have the Temperament to Be Captain Britain
Trade Captain Avalon Want Captain Avalon
